Lyric:
[by:XXXIIXXX]
[00:00.57]Lark, you never did get that far
[00:11.68]Did ya, did ya?
[00:13.92]I thought it wouldn't be this hard for us
[00:17.02]Know you're blue
[00:19.01]Lover it'll all turn around, you'll see
[00:20.87]It always does for you and me
[00:23.10]It always does
[00:25.19]I can't see the future
[00:29.02]Lately luck hasn't been a friend I know
[00:33.43]I can't be your sunlight
[00:37.89]But I'll hold you when you're cold
[00:42.16]I got you
[00:44.48]Kiss me with your painted soul
[00:48.76]I got you
[00:53.18]No matter what the future holds
[00:57.53]I got you
[01:02.15]It's a fact, the past it's just the past
[01:06.19]But when you do look back
[01:08.57]See how far we've come
[01:11.06]On love it'll all turn around you'll see always dose for you and me
[01:17.28]It always does
[01:20.32]I can't see the future
[01:23.58]Lately luck hasn't been a friend I know
[01:28.10]I can't be your sunlight
[01:32.50]But I'll hold you when you're cold
[01:36.78]I got you
[01:38.89]Kiss me with your painted soul
[01:43.38]I got you
[01:47.73]No matter what the future holds
[01:55.27]I got you
[01:57.52]I got you, painted soul
[02:09.11]No matter what the future holds
[02:13.20]I got you, painted soul
[02:17.24]No matter what the future holds
[02:21.66]I got you
[02:23.84]I got you (I got you)
[02:39.31]I got you
[02:41.01]Kiss me with your painted soul
[02:45.43]I got you
[02:49.70]No matter what the future holds
[02:56.48]I got you
[02:58.95]
